pageProps.content:
["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Entware 使用 opkg 来管理其软件包，只需修改 opkg 配置文件中的软件源地址，就可以使用镜像来下载软件包。"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["按照官方 Wiki 中的教程安装好 entware 后，使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sed"}]," 命令即可将软件源地址替换为本镜像站。"]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["替换后，请运行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"opkg update"}]," 命令，更新软件包 feed。"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"sed -i 's|https\?://bin.entware.net|{{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}|g' /opt/etc/opkg.conf
opkg update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["如果系统没有 sed 命令，可以手动编辑 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/opt/etc/opkg.conf"}]," 文件，编辑时请注意自己设备的处理器架构。
例如："]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"src/gz entware {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/aarch64-k3.10"}]]}]

meta.title: Entware 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
